loans.use: To purchase additional stock of rice, oil, flour, soap, and soft drinks, in bulk.

loans.name: Juane

texts.en:
Mambo from Mbeya, Tanzania! This is 31 year old Juane M.. She is married and has a one year old child. In 2006, Juane established her grocery business. She requires a loan in order to purchase additional stock of sugar, rice, and beans. She thanks you for your support.

SELFINA is engaged in the economic empowerment of women in Tanzania through the provision of a leasing and leaseback microfinance facility, as a practical way to achieve the economic and social emancipation of women.

SELFINA has taken a lead role as a pioneer of micro-credit in Tanzania through Micro-leasing. Customs and traditions in Tanzania normally make it difficult for women to own land and assets, thus they are termed not-creditworthy by financial institutions as they lack tangible collateral assets. This leads to poor financial support hence poor access to basic needs and services for women with low incomes.

SELFINA buys and leases equipment to women. Where a client needs working capital SELFINA buys equipment from said client, extending a loan to her, then leasing back the same equipment – a process called a sale and leaseback arrangement.

loans.use: To purchase additional stocks of rice, sugar, and beans, in bulk.

loans.name: Blessing

texts.en: Blessing O. is a married woman with 5 children ,and she hails from Ajamgbadi Lagos State Nigeria. She has a profitable business center she started in 2005. She has two computers, one laminating machine, and one photocopier, and has two computer trainees in her shop. Blessing is requesting for the loan of $875 to enable her buy more computers as she is expecting new trainees, and needs the equipment for them. She says thank you to Kiva and the lender for this opportunity.

loans.use: To buy more computers for training students

loans.name: Rene

texts.es:
Mr. Rene P. lives in his own home with his wife and children on E Street in the Llojeta zone of the city of La Paz. He is currently studying law and works as a paralegal in a law office, but he set up a general store, which his wife runs, in his home.

He is requesting this loan in order to increase his capital and restock his store, since there aren’t many general stores in his area. He would like to purchase more goods, offer a wider selection of products to his customers in the area, and increase his profits.

He has a good history, which qualifies him for a new loan. Rene has been our customer since 1999, which demonstrates his commitment to our institution.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

El señor Rene vive en casa propia con su esposa e hijos en la calle E de la zona de Llojeta de la ciudad de La Paz; Rene estudia derecho y trabaja como procurador en una consultora pero en su casa instaló una tienda de abarrotes la cual administra su esposa.

El crédito que solicita es para aumentar su capital y llenar de más productos la tienda ya que por la zona donde vive no hay muchas tiendas de abarrotes y lo que quiere es surtir sus productos, ofrecer mayor variedad a los clientes de la zona y mejorar sus ingresos.

Su antecedente histórico es bueno y califica para obtener un nuevo crédito. Rene es cliente nuestro desde el año 1999, lo cual demuestra su lealtad a nuestra institución.

loans.use: Purchase of more general store goods

loans.name: Kagwada South 2013-1 Group

texts.en:
The leader of this small group is Esther D.. She sells vegetables and is requesting a loan to expand her business. Esther is 28 years old and is married. Her husband is a security guard. She has 3 children ranging from ages 4 to 8 and her children go to school. Each week, Esther makes approximately 240 Sudanese pounds in profits and, with the extra profits from her loan, she hopes to be able to expand her business.

Esther is joined in her small group by Rose K., Hellen F., Flora K., and Tabu L.. Rose K. sells bread and wants to expand her business. Hellen F. runs a hotel and wants a loan to expand her business. Flora K. operates a business of brewing alcohol and wants to expand her business. Tabu L. sells vegetables and is requesting a loan to expand her business.

loans.use: Expand the business

loans.name: Gladis

texts.es:
Ms. Gladis R. has no children and lives in her own home on Juan Carrillo Street in the Achachicala zone of the city of La Paz. She has a silk-screening business (printing logos and advertising on clothing, hats, etc.) that yields moderate profits, which is why she decided to start a second business: clothing sales. She has been able to earn sufficient income to survive, but not enough to start saving.

She is requesting this loan in order to purchase fabric for her silk-screening business because due to her many years of experience, she now has many customers who order her high-quality products.

Gladis has good credit history, which qualifies her for a new loan. She has previously obtained 3 loans and repaid them by the due date. She has been our customer since 2005.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Gladis es mujer sola no tiene hijos vive en casa propia en la calle Juan Carrillo de la zona de Achachicala de la ciudad de La Paz; la actividad que tiene es la serigrafía (actividad de imprimir logos y propaganda en t-shirts, en telas, en gorras, etc.) y gana moderadamente por lo cual decidió iniciar una segunda actividad paralela: vender ropa, negocio con el cual ha logrado completar sus ingresos a un nivel bueno, pero no lo necesario como para comenzar a ahorrar.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar tela para la serigrafía ya que como trabaja desde hace mucho tiempo tiene muchos clientes que la conocen y realizan sus pedidos debido a la muy buena calidad de su trabajo.

Su antecedente histórico es bueno y califica para obtener un nuevo crédito. Gladis ya ha recibido tres créditos anteriores y los ha cancelado en sus fechas establecidas; es cliente nuestra desde el año 2005.

loans.use: Purchase of fabric for silk-screening business (stencil and embroidery)

loans.name: Mario

texts.es:
Mr. Mario F. lives in his own home with his parents on Buenos Aires Avenue in the Tiwiña zone of the city of La Paz. He is a dental technician who set up a small workshop inside his house, where he sees some patients, but he also works with dentists who order dental appliances such as crowns, bridges, dentures, etc.

He is requesting this loan in order to purchase an oxygen tank and other work materials.

He has not previously obtained a loan from our institution, but his credit check approves him to request one.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

El señor Mario vive en casa propia con sus padres en la Av. Buenos Aires de la zona de Tiwiña de la ciudad de La Paz; es de profesión mecánico dental, instaló un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde atiende a algunos pacientes pero también trabaja con dentistas que le hacen pedidos como ser prótesis, coronas, placas etc.

El crédito que solicita es para comprar un tubo de oxigeno y material para sus trabajos.

No tiene crédito con nuestra Institución pero el análisis socio económico lo califica para obtener uno.

loans.use: Purchase of oxygen tank and materials for dental technician’s workshop

loans.name: Pacesa

texts.es:
Ms. Pacesa T. rents a house on Manuel Cofre Street in the Tacagua zone of the city of La Paz. She has been legally separated from her husband for 13 years and has a 15-year-old daughter. Pacesa has been working as a housekeeper at a home in the southern area of La Paz for many years.

She is requesting this loan in order to continue paying for her daughter’s English lessons. This way, her daughter will have more opportunities to succeed in life.

She has good credit history, which approves her for a new loan. She has been our customer since 2007.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Pacesa vive en alquiler en la calle Manuel Cofre de la zona de Tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz; está separada del esposo hace 13 y años tiene una hija de 15 años. Pacesa trabaja como empleada domestica por varios años en una casa ubicada en la zona Sur de la ciudad de La Paz.

El crédito que solicita es para continuar pagando los cursos de ingles de su hija. De esta manera la hija tendrá mayores posibilidades de triunfar en la vida.

Su antecedente histórico es bueno y califica para obtener un nuevo crédito. Es cliente nuestra desde el año 2007.

loans.use: Continue paying for her daughter’s English lessons

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Ms. Sonia M. lives in her own home with her mother on Loyola Street in the Alto Tacagua district of the city of La Paz. Sonia has a one-year-old daughter and works as an operator in a Radio Taxi company. Furthermore, she recently obtained a car that she rents out as a taxi, which generates income for her on a daily basis.

She is requesting this loan in order to repair her vehicle, replace its tires, give maintenance to the engine, and perform a complete automobile check.

This is her first loan with Impro, but her credit check has determined that she is able to make monthly payments, so she qualifies for a loan.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Sonia vive en casa propia con su mama en la calle Loyola de la zona de Alto Tacagua de la ciudad de La Paz; Sonia tiene una hija de un año y trabaja como operadora en una compañía de servicio de Radio Taxi, además de haber adquirido recientemente un auto el cual le genera una renta diaria, también como radio taxi.

El crédito que solicita es para reparar su movilidad, cambiar llantas, mantenimiento de motor y chequeo completo de todo el automóvil.

No tiene antecedente con Impro es su primer crédito, pero califica para obtenerlo, pues el análisis de flujo de caja efectuado permite el pago de sus responsabilidades mensuales.

loans.use: Replace tires and give maintenance to her taxi

loans.name: Heidy De Jesus

texts.es:
Heidy, 35 years old, is seeking a loan to invest in the construction of a bathroom to improve the living conditions in her home and to have more personal privacy. She is a hard-working person who, despite her low salary at the agricultural school, was able to become an expert in accounting and works there as an assistant. When she married Julio Martin Campos, they didn’t even have a roof over their heads. Regardless, over time, they have been able to build a house with stone walls, a zinc roof and a brick floor.

She wants to provide for all of her family’s basic needs, which is why she will continue to labor to complete construction of their home. Items that still need to be built include a wall and porch, as these would provide her husband a safe place to realize his work as a carpenter. He currently conducts this endeavor inside of the house, which is causing respiratory problems for the family.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Heidy de 35 años, está solicitando un credito para invertirlo en la construccion de un baño y de esta forma mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y asi tener mayor privacidad y condiciones personales. Es una persona esforzada pues con su bajo salario en el Liceo Agricola logró formarse como técnica en contabilidad donde actualmente labora como Auxiliar, cuando se casó con el Sr. Julio Martin Campos no tenian un techo donde vivir y a través del tiempo han logrado construir su vivienda, con paredes de piedra cantera, techo de zinc y piso de ladrillo. Desea poder darle todas las necesidades básicas a su familia, es por eso que seguirá trabajando duro para terminar de construir totalmente su casa, lo siguiente será construir una tapia y el porche, porque de esta forma su esposo tendria un lugar seguro para realizar el trabajo de carpinteria ya que lo realiza dentro de la vivienda y les causa problemas respiratorios a la familia.

loans.use: Construction of a bathroom in the home.

loans.name: Irene

texts.fr:
Ms. Irene A. is 40 years old, married and the mother of 3. She lives and works in Adéta, a town located around 150 kilometers from Lome, the capital of Togo. To earn a living, Irene prepares traditional meals to sell. She specializes in fufu, a corn pasta which is served with a sauce. These plates are the locals' favorites. In the photo, Irene is holding the wood board that she uses turn the yams into fufu. With the loan, Irene would like to purchase more yams to make her fufu, more corn to make the pasta and a few varieties of meat (goat, chicken, fish etc.) to prepare the sauces for the two dishes. With the profit she will make, Irene would like to take charge of her family's needs and to send her children to school.

Translated from French to English by Kiva Volunteer, Kristin Connor.

Ms. Irene A. est âgée de 40 ans mariée et mére de 3 enfants. Elle habite et travaille à Adéta, une ville située à environ 150 kilomètres de Lomè, la capitale du Togo. Pour gagner de l’argent, Irene prépare les plats traditionnels pour revendre. Elle est spécialisée en fufu et pâte du maïs, qui sont servi avec la sauce. Ces plats sont les repas préférés de la population locale. Dans la photo, Irene a pris le pilon en bois avec lequel elle pile les ignames qui deviennent fufu. Avec ce crédit, Irene désire acheter encore des ignames pour la préparation du fufu, du maïs pour la préparation de la pâte et quelques types de viandes (chèvre, poulet, poisson, etc.) pour préparer les sauces pour les deux plats. Par les profits qu’elle va dégager dans la vente de ses marchandises, Irene peut participer à la prise en charges des besoins de la famille et envoyer ses enfants à l’école.

loans.use: To purchase ingredients to prepare meals.

loans.name: Missefan Agadon Group

texts.fr:
The present micro-project concerns the transformation of cassava root into cassava flour, called gari in Benin. This project is the initiative of the women's group MISSEFAN-AGADON, created in 1995 and composed of five members. It is located in KPANOU- KPADE in the D’AKPRO -MISSERETE community, which is a border community of the capital of Benin. This micro-project will enable the increase of production capacity of the group, the making of a profit, and the improvement of living conditions of its members.

Translated from French by Dan Kuey, Kiva Volunteer

Le présent micro-projet porte sur la transformation de manioc en farine de manioc appelée gari au BENIN. Il est l’initiative du groupement féminin MISSEFAN-AGADON crée en 1995 et composé de 5 membres. Il est situé à KPANOU-KPADE dans la commune D’AKPRO -MISSERETE qui est une commune frontalière à la capitale du BENIN. Ce micro-projet permettra d’augmenter la capacité de production du groupement, de dégager un bénéfice et d’améliorer les conditions de vie de ses membres.

loans.use: To buy 12 tons of cassava tubers

loans.name: Simplicia Lucia

texts.es:
Señora Simplicia, who belongs to the Group Mientras Tanto Mujeres Trabajadoras de Huaraz, sells groceries and sodas. He business is located in her home, Villón Bajo Pasaje 25, in the Huaraz District and Province, Department of Ancash. With this loan of 500 nuevos soles, which she will repay in 4 months, she will buy a sack of rice, a bucket of oil, and a bag of vermicelli noodles for her store. She is 63 years old and is separated from her husband. She has 6 children. All but one of her children live independently, leaving her only responsible for one of her daughters, a 25 year old student.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Simplicia, pertenece al Grupo Mientras Tanto Mujeres Trabajadoras de Huaraz, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes y gaseosas, su negocio esta ubicado en su domicilioque que esta ubicado en Villón Bajo Pasaje 25 en el distrito y provincia de Huaraz, departamento de Ancash. Con este préstamo de S/. 500.00 nuevos soles, el cual será cancelado en 4 meses , comprará: un saco de arroz, un balde de aceite y bolsa de fideos para su bodega. Ella tienen 63 años de edad, es separada tiene 6 hijos, independientes solamente a su responsabilidad esta una de sus hijas de 25 años que esta estudiando.

loans.use: With this loan she will buy more merchandise for her store

loans.name: Julia Daysi

texts.es:
Julia is a single 56 year-old mother of four children, three of whom still live with her. She is known throughout the city for her integrity, responsible nature and desire to improve her situation. With much effort she was able to graduate as a lawyer. Currently, she works for the Maria Elena Cuadra Movement providing training and consulting services to groups of women seeking assistance. She is a hard-working woman who fights to help her children succeed; one is a professional, and 2 are students at the university.

She seeks a loan to provide security for her home by installing bars on all the doors and windows. She also wishes to add a wall behind the house and purchase cement for a hall floor. She hopes to achieve the dream of having a decent home for her and her children.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Julia de 56 años de edad, soltera, madre de 4 hijos, de los cuales 3 estan con ella, es conocida en la ciudad por su honradez, responsabilidad y deseos de superacion, pues con esfuerzo propio se graduó de abogada. En la actualidad trabaja para el Movimieno Maria Elena Cuadra, brindando servicios de capacitacion y asesoria a grupos de mujeres que lo demandan, es una mujer trabajadora y luchadora por la superacion de sus hijos, de los cuales 1 es profesional y 2 estudiantes universitarios. Solicita su credito para darle seguridad a su vivienda, poniendo verjas atodas las puertas y ventanas, ademas desea levantar un muro en la parte trasera de su vivienda y comprar cemento para el piso de un corredor del fondo; espera poder lograr cumplir el sueño de tener una vivienda digna para ella y sus hijos.

loans.use: Add bars to her house doors and windows (for security) and purchase cement for a floor.

loans.name: Yanira Irma

texts.es:
Señora Yanira, who belongs to the Banco Comunal Las Triunfadoras de Nicrupampa, has a bookstore in a rented location near the Instituto Pedagógico of Huaraz, in the Independencia district, Huaraz Province, Ancash Department. With this loan of $675, which will be repaid in 4 months, she will buy 2 boxes of silicone liquid, 10 boxes of acrylic pens, boxes of glue, 20 boxes of mechanical pencils, 3 boxes of felt tip pens, 3 boxes of crayons, 3 dozen fountain pens, 3 boxes of contact paper, 4 boxes of correction fluid, 3 boxes of Pilot pens, and a bunch of artisan pencils.

Señora Yanira is 31 years old and is a single mother. She has one daughter and lives with her 65 year old mother. Both her mother and daughter depend on her financially; thanks to the energy and strong will that she has she is able to educate her daughter and give her the best she can. In the future, she is thinking about opening a little pharmacy in her home.

Translated from Spanish by Jessica Kaminsky, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Yanira, pertenece al Banco Comunal Las Triunfadoras de Nicrupampa, tiene su bazar - librería, en un local alquilado, ubicado cerca al Instituto Pedagógico de Huaraz, en el distrito de Independencia, Provincia de Huaraz, departamento de Ancash. Con este préstamo de S/.1,800., el cual será cancelado en 4 meses, comprará 2 cajas de silicona liquida, 10 cajas de plumón acrílico, cajas de goma, 20 cajas de lapicero, 3 cajas de plumones, 3 cajas de colores, 3 docenas de temperas, 3 cajas de vinifan, 4 cajas de corrector, 3 cajas lapiceros pilot, una gruesa de lápiz artesco. La señora tiene 31 años de edad es madre soltera, tiene una hija, vive con su Mamá de 65 años de edad, ambos dependen económicamente de ella, gracias al esfuerzo y la voluntad que tiene, puede educar a su hija y darles lo mejor que ella puede, par el futuro esta pensando en abrir una botica en su domicilio.

loans.use: To buy more merdandise for sale

loans.name: Karla Petrona

texts.es:
Karla is a young 30 year-old who works as an nursery assistant in the children’s hospital. The loan would be used to make improvements to her mother’s house, with whom she lives. She is a very responsible and hard-working person, but her small salary makes it difficult to make any improvements to the home.

It is a small dwelling that is part of a municipal project and she hopes to build a bedroom. She is single and supports her mother, who works as a housekeeper. She is a responsible and honest young woman, with a strong spirit to improve her situation. She is highly regarded by her workmates.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Karla es una joven de 30 años, trabaja como auxiliar de enfermeria en la clinica materno infantil, el crédito lo utilizará para mejorar la vivienda de su mamá con quien habita, es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora, ella tiene un salario muy bajo y muy dificil puede realizar otras obras en la vivienda. Ésta es una vivienda muy pequeña de un proyecto de la alcaldia y pretende construir un dormitorio, es soltera y apoya a su mamá que trabaja como doméstica, es una joven responsble honesta y con espiritu de superacion y muy estimada por sus compañeras de trabajo.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to build a bedroom.

loans.name: Glory

texts.en: Glory I. lives in Ishashi Lagos State Nigeria. She sell shoes and under garments in her community. She has being in this business since 2004, Glory is 30 years of age and still single. She is happy with her business because it has been a profitable one since she started it in 2004. Glory is requesting a loan of $525 to buy more stock so that she can meet the demands of her numerous customers. She is grateful to all that made the loan possible.

loans.use: To buy more stock of shoes and under garments

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Señora Gregoria is a member of the Banco Comunal Villa Turística de Catac II. She owns a grocery store in the district of Catac, Recuay province, in Ancash department.

She plans to pay back the S/. 1,500.00 loan in eight months. It will be used to buy 2 bags of rice, 2 bags of sugar, 2 cases of oil, a case of tuna, 2 crates of milk, 3 boxes of noodles, a case of chocolate, a case of butter, a case of soap, and a case of detergent.

She is 69 years old and is separated from her husband. The money her six children contribute help her to pay the household expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Jane Agg, Kiva Volunteer.

La Señora Gregoria, pertenece al Banco Comunal Villa Turística de Catac II, tiene su tienda de abarrotes en el distrito de Catac, Provincia de Recuay, departamento de Ancash.

Con este préstamo de S/. 1,500.00 el cual será cancelado en 8 meses comprará, 2 sacos de arroz, 2 sacos de azúcar, 2 cajas de aceite, una caja atún, 2 cajas de leche, 3 paquetes de fideos, una caja de chocolate, 1 caja de mantequilla, una caja de jabón, una bolsa de detergente.

Ella tiene 69 años de edad, es separada de su esposo y tiene 6 hijos sus ingresos le permite solventar los gastos de su hogar.

loans.use: She will use the loan to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Davinia Aracelly

texts.es:
Davinia Aracelly is a young woman 27 years of age, who works in the judicial complex. This is her first loan which she seeks to make improvements to her home such as adding a floor and roof as well as some expansion. The house is located in Residencial Bosques de Juigalpan. She is single, does not have children and is well-known throughout the city.

Her monthly salary requires her to turn to a loan to purchase the required building materials which are quite expensive. Her mother is a teacher, and she also tries to help out her family a little.

She is high-spirited and wishes to improve her conditions, and she also conducts jewelry sales to help with the home improvement plans.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn, Kiva Volunteer.

Davinia Aracelly es una joven de 27 años, trabaja en el Complejo Judicial, está solicitando su primer crédito para realizar mejoras a su vivienda en el Residencial Bosques de Juigalpan, como es poner el piso y techo a una ampliacion que esta realizando, no tiene hijos, es soltera y muy conocida en esta ciudad. Debido al salario que devenga mensualmente necesita apoyar se con un crédito debido a que los materiales estan sumamente caros, su mamá es profesora y ella ayuda un poco a su familia. Es abogada con alto estpiritu de superacion, ademas de su trabajo en el complejo realiza otra activiad: venta de joyas, para ayudarse en la ampliacion de su casa.

loans.use: Install brick in the interior of her house.
